metadata.title: Friday,15th December, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct houses for the police in Nakonde Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of the following infrastructure in Mitete District will be completed to enable Government workers who are currently working from Lukulu District to shift to Mitete:
(i) district administration offices; (ii) police station; (iii) police staff houses; (iv) medium and low cost houses; and
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing each project is; and

(c) what the time frame for the completion of each project is.
